TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MemberChangeConflict extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示以下情况：由于自客户端上次读取成员值后这些值已被更新，因此尝试的更新失败。

span.span: Represents a situation in which an attempted update fails because member values have been updated since the client last read them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例演示如何检索有关成员冲突信息。The following example shows how to retrieve information about members in conflict. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.MemberChangeConflict#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.memberchangeconflict/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.MemberChangeConflict#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.memberchangeconflict/vb/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentValue As Object
public: property System::Object ^ CurrentValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取发生冲突的成员的当前值。

span.span: Gets the current value of the member in conflict.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DatabaseValue As Object
public: property System::Object ^ DatabaseValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取发生冲突的成员的数据库值。

span.span: Gets the database value of the member in conflict.
The value of the object in conflict.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsModified As Boolean
public: property bool IsModified { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示自上次读取或刷新数据库后，是否已更改成员数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the member data has been changed since the last database read or refresh.

value.span: 如果成员数据已更改，则为 。

span.span: if the member data has been changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来合并新值，而不会覆盖挂起的更新。Use the property to merge new values without overwriting pending updates.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsResolved As Boolean
public: property bool IsResolved { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已解决冲突。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the conflict has been resolved.
if the conflict has been resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是只读的将自动更新解决冲突。This property is read-only and is automatically updated as conflicts are resolved.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Member As MemberInfo
public: property System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^ Member { System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取有关发生冲突的成员的元数据信息。

span.span: Gets metadata information about the member in conflict.

value.span: 有关发生冲突的成员的信息。

span.span: Information about the member in conflict.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OriginalValue As Object
public: property System::Object ^ OriginalValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取发生冲突的成员的原始值。

span.span: Gets the original value of the member in conflict.

value.span: 发生冲突的成员的原始值。

span.span: The original value of the member in conflict.

summary.span: 通过保留当前值并重置基线原始值以匹配较新数据库值来解决成员冲突。

span.span: Resolves member conflicts by keeping current values and resetting the baseline original values to match the more recent database values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Resolve(valuetype System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode refreshMode) cil managed

summary.span: 使用 参数可自动指定要设置为发生冲突的成员的当前值的值。

span.span: Uses a parameter to automatically specify the value to set as the current value for the member in conflict.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例演示使用的各种值生成哪些结果。The following examples show what results are produced by using the various values for . ## Examples 下面的示例将当前值覆盖数据库中的值。The following example overwrites current values with values from the database. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何替换的原始值与从数据库检索到的值。The following example shows how to swap the original value with the values retrieved from the database. 不会修改当前值。No current value is modified. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb#2)] 下面的示例将保留已更改，但数据库值更新其他值的当前值。The following example keeps the current values that have been changed, but updates the other values with database values. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Resolve(object value) cil managed

span.span: The value to set as the current value.

summary.span: 指定要设置为发生冲突的成员的当前值的值。

span.span: Specifies the value to set as the current value for the member in conflict.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此处设置的值是要用于后续的值操作。The value set here is the value to be used in a subsequent operation.
